channel.title: Feature Selection on Balint Bojko
channel.description: Recent content in Feature Selection on Balint Bojko

item.title: BDA Competition 3 - Predict the satisfaction of Amazon customers from their reviews
item.description: Description of project In this competition your task is to build a classifier that automatically recognize customer satisfaction from textual reviews of baby products that were sold on Amazon.com. Reviews and 5 star ratings were collected by Amazon on their site by inviting customers to enter a review of a product that had bought. In stead of relying on pre-trained features (such as the NRC and Afinn word lists), you will rely on automatic methods for feature selection.
